page.title: 15HOME LIFE KEEPING PETS
page.content: I have a lovely grey and white rabbit called Brighteyes. He jumps out of the cage when I open it. I love looking after him it is lonely without him. I had 4 other rabbits but they died in the cold weather leaving Brighteyes. My friend has 3 animals. Sam the dog is black. He eats cooked fresh meat with gravy and sometimes a chewy stick. She also has 2 black and white cats, they are brother and sister. Spindle has had kittens, she had 4 but 2 died then she had two who survived. Another friend has a 2 year old Alsatian he has dinner at 4pm and then is taken for a walk, this friend also has a rabbit which eats rabbit mix, and runs in the garden. Another friend also has an alsatian called Rebel. He gets told off for going upstairs and getting into the neighbours garden. He is in perfect health and is big for his age.
